20110127163617.000|20110127163618.000|CC1|>>> WE ARE BACK AT 8:36.        
20110127163618.000|20110127163621.000|CC1|THIS MORNING ON "FOREVER YOUNG" 
20110127163621.000|20110127163621.000|CC1|ALZHEIMER'S DISEASE.            
20110127163621.000|20110127163623.000|CC1|MILLIONS OF AMERICANS SUFFER    
20110127163623.000|20110127163624.000|CC1|FROM THIS PROGRESSIVE AND       
20110127163624.000|20110127163625.000|CC1|DEBILITATING CONDITION.         
20110127163625.000|20110127163627.000|CC1|IT CAN TAKE AN EMOTIONAL TOLL ON
20110127163627.000|20110127163629.000|CC1|THEIR FAMILIES AND CAREGIVERS AS
20110127163629.000|20110127163629.000|CC1|WELL.                           
20110127163629.000|20110127163634.000|CC1|DR. RICHARD ISAACSON IS FROM THE
20110127163634.000|20110127163635.000|CC1|UNIVERSITY OF MIAMI SCHOOL OF   
20110127163635.000|20110127163637.000|CC1|MEDICINE AND THE AUTHOR OF      
20110127163637.000|20110127163638.000|CC1|"TREATING ALZHEIMER'S,          
20110127163638.000|20110127163639.000|CC1|PREVENTING ALZHEIMER'S, A       
20110127163639.000|20110127163642.000|CC1|PATIENT AND FAMILY GUIDE 2011." 
20110127163642.000|20110127163644.000|CC1|DALE ATKINS IS A PSYCHOLOGIST.  
20110127163644.000|20110127163645.000|CC1|GOOD MORNING TO YOU BOTH.       
20110127163645.000|20110127163647.000|CC1|YESTERDAY WE TALKED ABOUT       
20110127163647.000|20110127163649.000|CC1|AGE-RELATED MEMORY LOSS THAT    
20110127163649.000|20110127163650.000|CC1|HAPPENS TO A LOT OF PEOPLE      
20110127163650.000|20110127163651.000|CC1|AROUND THE AGE OF 50.           
20110127163651.000|20110127163655.000|CC1|YOU HAD A HUGE RESPONSE FROM    
20110127163655.000|20110127163655.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110127163655.000|20110127163658.000|CC1|>> I THINK PEOPLE WERE HEARTENED
20110127163658.000|20110127163659.000|CC1|TO KNOW SOME OF THE ISSUES OF   
20110127163659.000|20110127163701.000|CC1|MEMORY LOSS RELATED TO AGING    
20110127163701.000|20110127163702.000|CC1|DIDN'T MEAN THEY WOULD HAVE     
20110127163702.000|20110127163703.000|CC1|ALZHEIMER'S DISEASE WHICH WE'LL 
20110127163703.000|20110127163704.000|CC1|TALK ABOUT TODAY.               
20110127163704.000|20110127163709.000|CC1|>> WE NEED TO DEFINE            
20110127163709.000|20110127163709.000|CC1|ALZHEIMER'S.                    
20110127163709.000|20110127163711.000|CC1|>> AS OPPOSED TO NORMAL         
20110127163711.000|20110127163714.000|CC1|AGE-RELATED MEMORY LOSS WHICH IS
20110127163714.000|20110127163716.000|CC1|SLOWNESS OF PROCESSING WHICH IS 
20110127163716.000|20110127163717.000|CC1|WHERE YOU FORGET A WORD BUT IT  
20110127163717.000|20110127163718.000|CC1|COMES BACK TO YOU.              
20110127163718.000|20110127163721.000|CC1|IT'S ON THE TIP OF YOUR TONGUE. 
20110127163721.000|20110127163722.000|CC1|ALZHEIMER'S IS A PROGRESSIVE    
20110127163722.000|20110127163723.000|CC1|DISORDER COMMONLY CHARACTERIZED 
20110127163723.000|20110127163725.000|CC1|BY SHORT-TERM MEMORY LOSS,      
20110127163725.000|20110127163727.000|CC1|CHANGES IN BEHAVIOR, SLEEP,     
20110127163727.000|20110127163728.000|CC1|ORIENTATION AND DATE.           
20110127163728.000|20110127163730.000|CC1|IT'S A MUCH MORE PROGRESSIVE AND
20110127163730.000|20110127163731.000|CC1|INSIDIOUS DISEASE.              
20110127163731.000|20110127163733.000|CC1|>> SOME OF THE SIGNS WOULD BE   
20110127163733.000|20110127163735.000|CC1|THAT YOU MAY NOTICE IN SOMEBODY?
20110127163735.000|20110127163737.000|CC1|>> WE CAN HAVE LOSING THE KEYS, 
20110127163737.000|20110127163739.000|CC1|CELL PHONES, FORGETTING         
20110127163739.000|20110127163741.000|CC1|APPOINTMENTS, GETTING LOST WHILE
20110127163741.000|20110127163741.000|CC1|DRIVING.                        
20110127163741.000|20110127163743.000|CC1|BASICALLY NOT BEING ABLE TO TAKE
20110127163743.000|20110127163745.000|CC1|CARE OF THE THINGS YOU WERE ABLE
20110127163745.000|20110127163746.000|CC1|TO TAKE CARE OF BEFORE THE ONSET
20110127163746.000|20110127163748.000|CC1|OF THE DISEASE.                 
20110127163748.000|20110127163751.000|CC1|>> IF SOMEBODY YOU KNOW AND LOVE
20110127163751.000|20110127163752.000|CC1|DEVELOPS ALZHEIMER'S, HOW DO YOU
20110127163752.000|20110127163754.000|CC1|BEGIN TO DEAL WITH THAT?        
20110127163754.000|20110127163757.000|CC1|>> WELL, I THINK HOW YOU BEGIN  
20110127163757.000|20110127163758.000|CC1|IS ALSO NOT GOING TO NECESSARILY
20110127163758.000|20110127163800.000|CC1|BE HOW YOU END.                 
20110127163800.000|20110127163803.000|CC1|HOW YOU BEGIN IS YOU ARE USUALLY
20110127163803.000|20110127163804.000|CC1|SHOCKED AND CONFUSED.           
20110127163804.000|20110127163805.000|CC1|YOU'RE GETTING A LOT OF         
20110127163805.000|20110127163806.000|CC1|INFORMATION THAT YOU MAY NOT BE 
20110127163806.000|20110127163809.000|CC1|ABLE TO PROCESS BECAUSE IT'S A  
20110127163809.000|20110127163810.000|CC1|FRIGHTENING DIAGNOSIS FOR       
20110127163810.000|20110127163811.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110127163811.000|20110127163813.000|CC1|WHAT YOU CAN DO IS TRY TO GET AS
20110127163813.000|20110127163815.000|CC1|MANY PEOPLE AROUND YOU WHO CAN  
20110127163815.000|20110127163815.000|CC1|HELP YOU.                       
20110127163815.000|20110127163817.000|CC1|SUPPORT IS IMPORTANT.           
20110127163817.000|20110127163818.000|CC1|LEARN AS MUCH AS YOU CAN ABOUT  
20110127163818.000|20110127163820.000|CC1|ALZHEIMER'S AND LEARN AS MUCH AS
20110127163820.000|20110127163821.000|CC1|YOU CAN ABOUT YOURSELF AND WHAT 
20110127163821.000|20110127163824.000|CC1|YOU NEED TO DO AND WHO'S GOING  
20110127163824.000|20110127163825.000|CC1|TO HELP YOU BECAUSE IF YOU ARE  
20110127163825.000|20110127163827.000|CC1|THE PRIMARY CAREGIVER, WHAT DO  
20110127163827.000|20110127163830.000|CC1|YOU NEED IN ORDER TO DO THINGS  
20110127163830.000|20110127163830.000|CC1|CORRECTLY?                      
20110127163830.000|20110127163832.000|CC1|I SAY CORRECTLY BECAUSE EVERY   
20110127163832.000|20110127163833.000|CC1|PERSON IS DIFFERENT.            
20110127163833.000|20110127163835.000|CC1|ALSO, BE CONSCIOUS THAT THIS IS 
20110127163835.000|20110127163836.000|CC1|STILL A PERSON AND THIS IS      
20110127163836.000|20110127163837.000|CC1|ALWAYS A PERSON.                
20110127163837.000|20110127163839.000|CC1|THE DIGNITY OF THE PERSON IS    
20110127163839.000|20110127163840.000|CC1|WHAT IS FOREMOST.               
20110127163840.000|20110127163842.000|CC1|SO THE PERSON NEEDS TO BE SAFE, 
20110127163842.000|20110127163844.000|CC1|SECURE AND YOU WILL CHANGE      
20110127163844.000|20110127163846.000|CC1|YOURSELF AS YOU RELATE TO THE   
20110127163846.000|20110127163848.000|CC1|PERSON SO THAT YOU WILL HAVE TO 
20110127163848.000|20110127163851.000|CC1|BE VERY PRESENT, UNDERSTAND THAT
20110127163851.000|20110127163852.000|CC1|THERE WILL BE SO MANY FEELINGS  
20110127163852.000|20110127163854.000|CC1|THAT WILL OVERTAKE YOU AT TIMES.
20110127163854.000|20110127163855.000|CC1|DEAL WITH THE FEELINGS IN THE   
20110127163855.000|20110127163856.000|CC1|APPROPRIATE SITUATION SO WHEN   
20110127163856.000|20110127163859.000|CC1|YOU ARE WITH THE PERSON YOU ARE 
20110127163859.000|20110127163901.000|CC1|AS PLEASANT, AS POSITIVE AND AS 
20110127163901.000|20110127163903.000|CC1|FOCUSED AS YOU CAN BE.          
20110127163903.000|20110127163905.000|CC1|>> MY DAD HAD ALZHEIMER'S, MY   
20110127163905.000|20110127163905.000|CC1|SISTER DID.                     
20110127163905.000|20110127163907.000|CC1|MY BROTHER IS NOW IN A FACILITY 
20110127163907.000|20110127163910.000|CC1|WITH ADVANCED STAGE ALZHEIMER'S.
20110127163910.000|20110127163911.000|CC1|WE CAN TRACE IT BACK.           
20110127163911.000|20110127163913.000|CC1|HE'S ONLY 62.                   
20110127163913.000|20110127163914.000|CC1|WHEN HE WAS FIRST DIAGNOSED AND 
20110127163914.000|20110127163916.000|CC1|IF PEOPLE HAVE BEEN RECENTLY    
20110127163916.000|20110127163919.000|CC1|DIAGNOSED HE KNEW IT WAS GOING  
20110127163919.000|20110127163920.000|CC1|TO HAPPEN.                      
20110127163920.000|20110127163921.000|CC1|THAT WAS DEVASTATING FOR HIM.   
20110127163921.000|20110127163923.000|CC1|WHAT DO YOU SAY TO THOSE        
20110127163923.000|20110127163923.000|CC1|PATIENTS?                       
20110127163923.000|20110127163925.000|CC1|>> IT'S IMPORTANT THAT AS SOON  
20110127163925.000|20110127163927.000|CC1|AS WE NOTICE SIGNS OF CHANGES,  
20110127163927.000|20110127163929.000|CC1|SHORT-TERM MEMORY LOSS, WHATEVER
20110127163929.000|20110127163931.000|CC1|THE FIRST SYMPTOM IS, GET       
20110127163931.000|20110127163933.000|CC1|INFORMED, EDUCATED AND SEE A    
20110127163933.000|20110127163934.000|CC1|QUALIFIED HEALTH CARE           
20110127163934.000|20110127163934.000|CC1|PROFESSIONAL.                   
20110127163934.000|20110127163936.000|CC1|THE EARLIER WE DIAGNOSE, THE    
20110127163936.000|20110127163937.000|CC1|EARLIER WE CAN TREAT.           
20110127163937.000|20110127163938.000|CC1|AND THE BETTER PATIENTS DO.     
20110127163938.000|20110127163940.000|CC1|THERE IS NOTHING TO BE ASHAMED  
20110127163940.000|20110127163941.000|CC1|OF WITH ALZHEIMER'S.            
20110127163941.000|20110127163942.000|CC1|ALZHEIMER'S DISEASE IS ONE OF   
20110127163942.000|20110127163943.000|CC1|THE MOST COMMON DISEASES OUT    
20110127163943.000|20110127163944.000|CC1|THERE.                          
20110127163944.000|20110127163946.000|CC1|IF YOU'RE 85 OR OLDER YOU HAVE A
20110127163946.000|20110127163947.000|CC1|45% CHANCE OF HAVING ALZHEIMER'S
20110127163947.000|20110127163948.000|CC1|DISEASE.                        
20110127163948.000|20110127163949.000|CC1|SO IT'S COMMON.                 
20110127163949.000|20110127163951.000|CC1|GET OUT THERE, GET INFORMED.    
20110127163951.000|20110127163953.000|CC1|DEVELOP A NETWORK OF CAREGIVERS,
20110127163953.000|20110127163954.000|CC1|NURSES, PSYCHOLOGISTS.          
20110127163954.000|20110127163956.000|CC1|SEE A SOCIAL WORKER AND A       
20110127163956.000|20110127163957.000|CC1|QUALIFIED HEALTH CARE           
20110127163957.000|20110127163958.000|CC1|PROFESSIONAL.                   
20110127163958.000|20110127163958.000|CC1|GET DIAGNOSED EARLY.            
20110127163958.000|20110127164000.000|CC1|>> I THINK ONE OF THE ISSUES,   
20110127164000.000|20110127164001.000|CC1|TOO, DALE.                      
20110127164001.000|20110127164002.000|CC1|WE WERE TALKING ABOUT THIS ON   
20110127164002.000|20110127164003.000|CC1|THE BREAK.                      
20110127164003.000|20110127164005.000|CC1|IF YOU HAVE SOMEBODY IN YOUR    
20110127164005.000|20110127164007.000|CC1|LIFE WITH ALZHEIMER'S, VERY     
20110127164007.000|20110127164008.000|CC1|OFTEN PEOPLE STOP VISITING THAT 
20110127164008.000|20110127164010.000|CC1|PERSON AND FEEL GUILT ABOUT IT  
20110127164010.000|20110127164012.000|CC1|BUT THERE IS A DISCONNECT       
20110127164012.000|20110127164013.000|CC1|BECAUSE THE PERSON NO LONGER    
20110127164013.000|20110127164014.000|CC1|KNOWS WHO THEY ARE.             
20110127164014.000|20110127164016.000|CC1|>> OFTEN PEOPLE DON'T KNOW WHO  
20110127164016.000|20110127164017.000|CC1|THEY ARE, BUT THERE ARE SO MANY 
20110127164017.000|20110127164018.000|CC1|WAYS TO REACH PEOPLE.           
20110127164018.000|20110127164020.000|CC1|IT'S NOT JUST THE FAMILIARITY   
20110127164020.000|20110127164022.000|CC1|OF, OH, HI, MEREDITH.           
20110127164022.000|20110127164023.000|CC1|I REMEMBER YOU.                 
20110127164023.000|20110127164024.000|CC1|THERE ARE OTHER WAYS WE REACH   
20110127164024.000|20110127164024.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110127164024.000|20110127164026.000|CC1|WITH MUSIC, WITH PETS.          
20110127164026.000|20110127164028.000|CC1|WE REACH PEOPLE WITH PHOTOGRAPHS
20110127164028.000|20110127164029.000|CC1|FROM THE HISTORY.               
20110127164029.000|20110127164031.000|CC1|YOU NEVER KNOW WHAT'S GOING TO  
20110127164031.000|20110127164032.000|CC1|TRIGGER THAT MEMORY.            
20110127164032.000|20110127164034.000|CC1|WE ALSO REACH PEOPLE BY JUST    
20110127164034.000|20110127164036.000|CC1|BEING WITH THEM, HAVING A GENTLE
20110127164036.000|20110127164038.000|CC1|TOUCH AND BEING ABLE TO CONNECT 
20110127164038.000|20110127164042.000|CC1|IN A WAY THAT IS A HUMAN TO     
20110127164042.000|20110127164042.000|CC1|HUMAN SOUL.                     
20110127164042.000|20110127164043.000|CC1|IF SOMEONE DOESN'T RECOGNIZE    
20110127164043.000|20110127164044.000|CC1|YOU, DON'T GIVE UP.             
20110127164044.000|20110127164045.000|CC1|NUMBER ONE, THEY NEED TO HAVE   
20110127164045.000|20110127164047.000|CC1|SOCIAL STIMULATION.             
20110127164047.000|20110127164048.000|CC1|PEOPLE NEED TO BE ENGAGED AND   
20110127164048.000|20110127164050.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE WHO CARE FOR THEM    
20110127164050.000|20110127164051.000|CC1|NEED RESPITE CARE.              
20110127164051.000|20110127164053.000|CC1|THEY NEED TO HAVE SOMEONE TO    
20110127164053.000|20110127164053.000|CC1|SUPPORT THEM.                   
20110127164053.000|20110127164056.000|CC1|BUT ADDITIONALLY, YOU CAN BE    
20110127164056.000|20110127164057.000|CC1|PRESENT AND UNDERSTAND THAT IF  
20110127164057.000|20110127164059.000|CC1|YOU'RE WITH SOMEONE AT THIS     
20110127164059.000|20110127164100.000|CC1|MOMENT, DON'T WORRY ABOUT THE   
20110127164100.000|20110127164101.000|CC1|FUTURE.                         
20110127164101.000|20110127164103.000|CC1|WHEN THEY START SAYING SOMETHING
20110127164103.000|20110127164104.000|CC1|OVER AND OVER AGAIN SAY, YES, I 
20110127164104.000|20110127164106.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND THAT'S A CONCERN TO  
20110127164106.000|20110127164107.000|CC1|YOU AND THEN DISTRACT.          
20110127164107.000|20110127164109.000|CC1|SPEAK IN SHORT SENTENCES.       
20110127164109.000|20110127164111.000|CC1|USE CONCRETE LANGUAGE.          
20110127164111.000|20110127164113.000|CC1|BE GENTLE AND KEEP YOURSELF AS  
20110127164113.000|20110127164115.000|CC1|QUIET AND CALM AS YOU CAN.      
20110127164115.000|20110127164116.000|CC1|PEOPLE WHO HAVE ALZHEIMER'S ARE 
20110127164116.000|20110127164120.000|CC1|VERY OFTEN DISTRACTED AND ARE   
20110127164120.000|20110127164121.000|CC1|BOTHERED BY LOUD NOISES AND     
20110127164121.000|20110127164122.000|CC1|THINGS LIKE THIS.               
20110127164122.000|20110127164124.000|CC1|IF YOU ARE THERE AND YOU'RE CALM
20110127164124.000|20110127164125.000|CC1|AND PRESENT, YOU CAN MAXIMIZE   
20110127164125.000|20110127164126.000|CC1|YOUR TIME TOGETHER.             
20110127164126.000|20110127164128.000|CC1|>> ALL RIGHT.                   
20110127164128.000|20110127164129.000|CC1|DALE, THANK YOU VERY MUCH.      
20110127164129.000|20110127164131.000|CC1|DR. ISAACSON AS WELL, THANK YOU.
